item.title: Variance Reduction Methods
item.description: Scenrio -> let’s say we’ve rolled out a new machine learning model and want to test if it is better than the existing model. We’ll randomly assign customers to either the existing model or new model, and then compare on click-through rate (). As a baseline, we can also account for historical responses to marketing emails. That is, what percent of existing emails has the individual clicked through? Engagement is defined as poop
